author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2754, LUCENE-2757: Added a wrapper around MultiTermQueries to add span support: SpanMultiTermQueryWrapper<Q extends MultiTermQuery>. Using this wrapper its easy to add fuzzy/wildcard to e.g. a SpanNearQuery. This patch also refactors all RewriteMethods and Attributes in MTQ (class was unmaintainable).
